snippet: Aidan O’Brien became the first trainer to saddle three consecutive Epsom Derby winners as Australia, the 11-to-8 favorite, prevailed in England.
abstract: Aidan O’Brien becomes the first trainer to saddle three consecutive Epsom Derby winners as Australia, the 11-to-8 favorite, prevails in England.
lead_paragraph: Aidan O’Brien became the first trainer to saddle three consecutive Epsom Derby winners as Australia, the 11-to-8 favorite, prevailed in England.
